fields.name: CustomData
fields.description: A custom definition for the USer Definition.

fields.name: DatabaseName
fields.description: The database name for which access is being granted for this User Definition.

fields.name: Mechanisms
fields.description: The Mongo Auth mechanism. For now, we only support auth mechanism SCRAM-SHA-256.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: The password for User Definition. Response does not contain user password.

fields.name: Roles
fields.description: The set of roles inherited by the User Definition.

fields.name: UserName
fields.description: The user name for User Definition.
